biotools.summary: It facilitates several steps that frequently occur in the context of multi-OMICS workflows like data conversion, quality control, data comparison, differential/statistical analyses, GO and pathway analyses. In the present version, CrossPlatformCommander enables Integration data obtained from Proteomics and Transcriptomics measurements.

bioschemas.name: XPlatCom (Cross PLATform COMmander)
